asset.content:
We are looking for a Web Manager to take overall responsibility of its corporate website and several ancillary websites.

Typcial assignments include:

  • Overseeing creation and maintenance of site content
  • Oversight and management of support staff
  • Making recommendations on policy and adoption of technologies

Required skills, knowledge and experience:

  • At least 3 years of hands-on experience managing websites, preferably in the role of a project manager.
  • A degree in a related field
  • Demonstrated proficiency with a variety of related web technologies:
    • HTML/CSS
    • Server-side scripting languages (Java, PHP, Rails, Python)
    • Content Management Systems

If you enjoy autonomy, diversity in your roles and utilising your initiative apply for this role now.
We have received your application and will get back to you once we have made a decision.

By submitting this form, I certify that all information provided within is correct to the best of my knowledge. I understand that false statements may result in termination of my employment, if hired.

I understand that my information obtained via this application process will be stored indefinetely in a private database for future use in recruiment efforts by the company.
